Text:
Yet again, I am the first to say thankyou. Your efforts ARE appreciated.
I have probably asked this before, but, as I almost lost ALL of the collection in the 'Metal Rocks' series, what ever happened to Volumes 9, 10 and 11? A truly awsome series. Please keep up the great work. Be well. T.
I actually don't know! There hs disappeared! And I don't have them anymore because of the size!
Damn, Is there anybody out there who can help, pretty please? In anticipation, Cheers.
